00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_pool)
00032 
00033 
00039 /* Package-scope objects ---------------------------------------------------*/
00040 QF_EPOOL_TYPE_ QF_pool_[3];                       /* allocate 3 event pools */
00041 uint8_t QF_maxPool_;                   /* number of initialized event pools */
00042 
00043 /*..........................................................................*/
00044 void QF_poolInit(void *poolSto, uint32_t poolSize, QEventSize evtSize) {
00045                       /* cannot exceed the number of available memory pools */
00046     Q_REQUIRE(QF_maxPool_ < (uint8_t)Q_DIM(QF_pool_));
00047             /* please initialize event pools in ascending order of evtSize: */
00048     Q_REQUIRE((QF_maxPool_ == (uint8_t)0)
00049               || (QF_EPOOL_EVENT_SIZE_(QF_pool_[QF_maxPool_ - 1]) < evtSize));
00050                 /* perfom the platform-dependent initialization of the pool */
00051     QF_EPOOL_INIT_(QF_pool_[QF_maxPool_], poolSto, poolSize, evtSize);
00052     ++QF_maxPool_;                                         /* one more pool */
00053 }
